title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: The bug report does not provide the observed behavior.
EB: The children are not listed when changing the data source. The expected behavior is to have the children listed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement.
2. Open the data set editor and go to the data source page.
3. Change the data source.

Actual result: The new data source does not show any database/table/column information. There are no children listed. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
